name: Power's Out! (JJ & Friends!)
description:
The power's out, and JJ isn't happy! Help her navigate the darkness so she can finally get some sleep.

This was submitted to Godot Wild Jam #40. The theme was "Cozy". I chose the "Overworked" and "Splash-Screen" wildcards. It's a short, silly story about being stuck in the dark.

Time to finish: 5 minutes

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Spacebar to interact. You may need to click inside the game window if the controls are not working.

Audio: Music is from Pixabay, "Christmas Knocking to the Door" by Lesfm. Sound effects are from mixkit.co. If the audio does not play, you may need to use Chrome or Firefox.

Ages: Everyone

To learn more about the main character, you can play JJ, a longer game also made with Godot Engine!
